hop.from: Read Data from Adempiere for Cash Document

step.name: Merge Join by AD_Org_ID
step.step1: Read Data from Adempiere for Cash Document

step.name: Read Data Sucursal from Transporte
step.sql: SELECT nid_sucursal,ad_org_id FROM tsucursal ORDER BY ad_org_id ASC

step.name: Read Data from Adempiere for Cash Document
step.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT (SELECT ad_table_id FROM ad_table WHERE tablename='C_Invoice') AS ad_table_id,c_invoice_id AS record_id,documentno,controlno,dateinvoiced AS datedoc, grandtotal,'I' AS recordtype, 0 AS isprocessed, bp.taxid, i.ad_org_id FROM c_invoice i INNER JOIN c_bpartner bp ON i.c_bpartner_id = bp.c_bpartner_id WHERE issotrx='N' AND docstatus = 'CO' AND i.ad_client_id = ${COMPANY} UNION ALL SELECT (SELECT ad_table_id FROM ad_table WHERE tablename='C_CashLine') AS ad_table_id,c_cashline_id AS record_id,cl.referenceno AS documentno,controlno,datedoc, amount AS grandtotal,'C' AS recordtype, 0 AS isprocessed, bp.taxid, cl.ad_org_id FROM c_cash c INNER JOIN c_cashline cl ON c.c_cash_id=cl.c_cash_id INNER JOIN c_bpartner bp ON cl.c_bpartner_id = bp.c_bpartner_id WHERE c.docstatus='CO' AND cashtype = 'C' AND cl.ad_client_id = ${COMPANY} UNION ALL SELECT (SELECT ad_table_id FROM ad_table WHERE tablename='M_Inventory') AS ad_table_id,i.m_inventory_id AS record_id,i.documentno,'' AS controlno,i.movementdate AS datedoc, SUM(cd.currentcostprice) AS grandtotal,'M' AS recordtype, 0 AS isprocessed, oi.taxid, i.ad_org_id FROM m_inventory i INNER JOIN m_inventoryline il ON i.m_inventory_id = il.m_inventory_id INNER JOIN m_costdetail cd ON il.m_inventoryline_id = cd.m_inventoryline_id INNER JOIN ad_orginfo oi ON i.ad_org_id = oi.ad_org_id WHERE i.docstatus='CO' AND i.isinternal = 'Y' AND i.ad_client_id = ${COMPANY} GROUP BY (SELECT ad_table_id FROM ad_table WHERE tablename='M_Inventory'),i.m_inventory_id,i.documentno,i.movementdate,oi.taxid) records ORDER BY ad_org_id ASC

hop.from: Read Data for Travel Charge from Adempiere
Read Data for Merge Sucursal from Transporte
Read Data for Merge Driver from Transporte
Read Data for Merge Vehicle from Transporte

step.name: Merge Join Driver
step.step2: Read Data for Merge Driver from Transporte

step.name: Merge Join Org
step.step1: Read Data for Travel Charge from Adempiere
step.step2: Read Data for Merge Sucursal from Transporte

step.name: Merge Join Vehicle
step.step2: Read Data for Merge Vehicle from Transporte

step.name: Read Data for Merge Driver from Transporte
step.sql: SELECT cid_chofer,fta_driver_id FROM tchofer WHERE fta_driver_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY fta_driver_id ASC

step.name: Read Data for Merge Sucursal from Transporte
step.sql: SELECT nid_sucursal,ad_org_id FROM tsucursal ORDER BY ad_org_id ASC

step.name: Read Data for Merge Vehicle from Transporte
step.sql: SELECT cid_vehiculo,fta_vehicle_id FROM tvehiculo WHERE fta_vehicle_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY fta_vehicle_id ASC

step.name: Read Data for Travel Charge from Adempiere
step.sql: SELECT rw.AD_Org_ID,mg.documentno AS cguia,rw.outdate AS d_fecha_guia,et.fta_vehicle_id, et.fta_driver_id,lo.documentno AS corden_carga, 0 AS isprocessed, rw.fta_recordweight_id,rw.netweight FROM fta_entryticket et INNER JOIN fta_loadorder lo ON et.fta_entryticket_id = lo.fta_entryticket_id INNER JOIN fta_recordweight rw ON lo.fta_loadorder_id = rw.fta_loadorder_id INNER JOIN fta_mobilizationguide mg ON rw.fta_recordweight_id = mg.fta_recordweight_id WHERE et.AD_Client_ID = ${COMPANY} ORDER BY rw.AD_Org_ID,et.FTA_Driver_ID,et.FTA_Vehicle_ID ASC

step.name: Table input
step.sql: SELECT fta_driver_id, value, name FROM fta_driver WHERE ad_client_id= ${COMPANY}

step.name: fta_vehicle
step.sql: SELECT fta_vehicle_id, left(description,60) as value, name FROM fta_vehicle where ad_client_id = ${COMPANY}

step.name: Table input
step.sql: SELECT ad_org_id, value, name FROM adempiere.ad_org where ad_client_id = ${COMPANY}

step.name: Data Driver Adempiere
step.sql: SELECT * FROM FTA_Driver WHERE AD_Client_ID = ${COMPANY} ORDER BY value ASC

step.name: Data Driver Transport
step.sql: SELECT * FROM tchofer ORDER BY cid_chofer ASC

step.name: Data Vehicle Adempiere
step.sql: SELECT * FROM FTA_Vehicle WHERE AD_Client_ID = ${COMPANY} ORDER BY vehicleplate ASC

step.name: Data Vehicle Transport
step.sql: SELECT * FROM tvehiculo ORDER BY cid_vehiculo ASC

notepad.note: Update Data From Adempiere to Transporte.
